name: Parallax
description: Parallax is a digital media company based in the heart of Leeds. With clients all over the world and a passion for everything digital, we are growing fast and committed to providing excellence in digital media services. With a wealth of experience in the digital industry, we have an impeccable track record for helping our customers gain popularity in the online world and beyond. Our expertise in digital media has resulted in work with a range of sectors and industries.
